title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 March 2014 - XWiki
content:
<xWikiUser> has joined #xwiki  
00:17 <xWikiUser> Hi. Anyone have tips on upgrading xWiki 3.0 to 4.2 or to 5.4.3?  
00:18 <xWikiUser> When I try 4.2, it runs the Distribution Wizard and fails at the xWikiAdminGroup document.  
00:39 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki

08:44 <DarkKnightCZ> is there a way how to use computed field as value key in database list? (or another field that can have automatic unique value)  
08:45 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <DarkKnightCZ> ok, doc.fullName is working there

13:39 <DarkKnightCZ> tmortagne: hi, you could know this... which code creates the json request after file upload (with params xpage=attachmentslist&forceTestRights=1)? Problems it's forced to use http and does not follow redirects (so the request "fails" every time)... I guess the problem is with 5.2-5.4 (on 5.1 it works as expected), or tomcat is somehow involved in this (5.1 runs on jetty)... this also happens in update manager  
13:40 <tillo> has joined #xwiki
